name: PHILLY Bavarian Apple Torte
author: Philadelphia
summary: Easy to prepare and absolutely delicious, this is a rich dessert perfect for special occasions.
ingredients: 1 (250 g) package PHILADELPHIA Brick Cream Cheese, softened
4 each Granny Smith or Golden Delicious apples, peeled, sliced
directions: Beat butter and 1/3 cup of the sugar in small bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until light and fluffy
Spread onto bottom and 1 inch up side of 9-inch springform pan
Beat cream cheese and 1/3 cup of the remaining sugar in same bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended
Add egg and vanilla; mix well
Combine remaining 1/3 cup sugar and the cinnamon
Add to apples in large bowl; toss to coat
Spoon over cream cheese layer; sprinkle with almonds
Reduce temperature to 375 degrees F; continue baking 25 min
Loosen torte from rim of pan
Cover and refrigerate 3 hours before serving
